Caring for the
environment

Our dishes are free of harmful and toxic substances that adversely impair human health and they fully decompose in the soil without harming the environment - 100% eco-friendly.

We will include cutlery in the order only at your request.

Order now
It suits you if
  • Constant disruption of the nutrition plan
  • Snacking on candy or fast food in-between meals
  • Lack of time to prepare healthy meals
  • Poor quality products in the supermarket near the house
  • Unclear composition of dishes in cafes and restaurants

Do you want to eat only the healthiest foods made from carefully selected, high-quality ingredients?

If your answer is yes, then SimplyFood is the perfect solution for you.

Start with a 5 day trial
Order a 5-Day Food Trial Kit for just 60$
How it works
How it works
Submit a request
Order food online or over the phone. Set the start date of the program and let us know if you wish to change the menu.
Get the order
Every morning, immediately after preparation, our courier delivers the dishes to you. Refrigerate them once received.
Eat tasty and healthy
Get the most out of your meals every day. Before eating, you simply need to warm it up.

FAQ
FAQ
1. How frequently should I eat the meals?
We recommend that you eat every 2.5-3 hours.
2. Who decides on the menu?
A skilled professional nutritionist compiles and edits the menu based on our chef's technological maps and recipes.
3. How frequently is the menu updated?
Every week we change all our diets. Our weekly meal packages are designed so that the diet meals are not repeated every day. We completely update the monthly menu once every quarter.
4. How frequently are deliveries made each week?
Healthy food delivery service provides daily delivery of healthy nutrition programs of your choice - either in the evening or in the morning. We prepare meals and deliver them right away, ensuring that our food is always flavorful and fresh. The courier will be at your location for 20 minutes. The courier then proceeds to the next address.
5. Is it possible to reheat meals in containers?
For packing food, we use heat-resistant packaging in the form of trays that can be heated in a microwave oven. The recommended warm-up time is 1-2 minutes.
6. What products do you use?
We buy meat, milk, cereals, vegetables, and fruits only from suppliers who have conformity certificates for the products supplied. Purchases are made daily.
Delivery

We deliver regularly (daily or every alternate day). Every morning or evening - the choice is yours
